name: com.castsoftware.nosqljava
title: NoSQL for Java
description: The extension provides MongoDB, Marklogic, CouchDB, Redis, DynamoDB, CosmosDB, Memcached, Elasticsearch, Couchbase, ApacheLucene, MongoDB with Spring-data, Couchbase with Spring-data, CosmosDB with Spring-data, Redis with Spring-data Elasticsearch with Spring-data, DynamoDB with Spring-data support and Amazon DocumentDB for the JEE analyzer.
